name: Gremkus Ruins Christmas
description:
It was almost a peaceful night in the town of Chilly Peak, Bob slowly drifted away waiting for Christmas morning...

Of course that wasn't going to happen! Naughty Gremkus decided they want to ruin Christmas!

Arm a fort with your friend Sally to take a final stand against the grumpy goblin and their squishy minions! Will you survive or will his plans succeed?

Play as Bob as you swing with all your might to lob frozen projectiles at your foes. If the enemies get too close they will start trampling the presents! You can spare a few lost presents, but if too many get destroyed it's game over for you..

Mini Game Jam, Created using 001 Game Creator. Make your own dream creations today!
